version_description: Need any help? you can now contact the team on WhatsApp, Telegram & many more!

- Added 179 bus timing.
- Added crash support for the app - kindly send the report when it crashes to us and describe what you did to cause the crash.
- Fixed issue causing some users apps crashing on launch.

1. Campus Service Info Page for you to get contact information / opening hours of shops / services.
2. Decreased app load time!
3. Fixed several bugs that happens on some devices - including NTUMap Search crash.
4. The barcode for LWN library service is now optimized for scanning!

1. Support for 179A and 199 bus timings!
2. You can now copy phone numbers from the campus info page!
3. More intuitive UI when searching for a place in NTU Maps.
4. Option to send feedback to us directly in the app without using social media and email.
5. Fixed bugs that appear in the profile and bus timing pages.
6. Fixed bug where app crashes occasionally on startup.

New features:
1. New look!
2. A whole new page for events!
2. Upgraded front page bus timings
3. Faster campus map

Bug fixes:
1. More stable timetable
2. Profile photo upload does not immediately update
